Translations.Text: Allahara nama niye (arambha karachi), (yini) rahamana (--parama karunamaya, yini asima karuna o daya basatah bisbajagatera samasta srstira sahabasthanera prayojaniya saba byabastha agrima kare rekhechena), (yini) rahima (--aphuranta phaladata, yamra apara karuna o dayara phale pratyekera ksudratama subha-pracesta'o bipulabhabe saphalyamandita o puraskrta haye thake).
Samasta prasansa allah‌ra prapya, samudaya srsta-jagatera rabba.
“Tomara'i amara ebadata kari, ebam tomara'i kache amara sahayya prarthana kari.”
“tadera pathe yadera prati tumi niyamata arpana karecha, tadera byatita yadera prati gayaba eseche, ebam tadera'o naya yara pathabhrasta.”
